Others: Karl-Anthony Towns is ruled out to play against the Charlotte Hornets on October 16 due to rest.
Karl-Anthony Towns started his Knicks career against the Hornets on October 6.
Karl-Anthony Towns had 10 points in 15 minutes in his first game against the Hornets.
Karl-Anthony Towns registered 25 points and 12 rebounds in his second game.
Karl-Anthony Towns had 16 points and 16 rebounds against his former team, the Timberwolves.
